course_name: Human Function in Health & Disease B
description: PHYL2067 will provide an overview of human diseases in relation to physiological systems. Students will examine: 1) movement and its associated problems, 2) the role of hormones in physical disease and stress, 3) burns and pain, and 4) the absorption of nutrients and excretion of waste.
restricted: Restricted to BOccThy, MOccThySt students only
